About Us

Delivering Innovative Solutions

We help organization re-engineer themselves to ever changing customer requirements by providing innovative technology solutions.

Company

Cware Technologies is an independent IT Consulting and Engineering organization headquartered in Islamabad, Pakistan with Sales offices in Middle East.
We present comprehensive tools and services to wide-ranging business so that anyone, novice or expert, can leverage technology and thrive. We help organization's re-engineer themselves to ever changing customer requirements.

What We Do?

In today's competing business world it is impossible to succeed without knowing your customer well. With our specialized customer oriented software's you can achieve high customer retention and satisfaction by knowing and engaging your customers/clients in an efficient way.
We are offering softwares's for a wide ranging of industries to better manage their employees and build long term relationships with them. Our software's are helping businesses to collaborate within the organization with ease and effectiveness. Now managing the payroll, attendance and files within organization is as easy and as you like them to be.

Vision

"In this era of technological advancements; Innovation matters for all of us. We want to help companies grow by having a customer centric approach at the top and leverage latest technology to innovate advance software solutions and transform digitally to maximize returns."
